case.state: Wait, this wasn't the castle I was looking for...
Hey, is this Luigi's Mansion? I'm not doing any vacuuming, just so you're aware. That is by far the worst kind of sucking.
Bwa ha ha! Think you can take the Koopa Queen?!
For your own safety, I advise you don't touch this crown on my head. Unless you're into that, of course.
You hesitated for a couple of seconds before picking me, didn't you? Don't worry, ~player~, it's not gay if the crown stays on.
You'd be surprised how good the Koopas are at Poker. Bring it on!
You know, conquering the Mushroom Kingdom was getting old. I'm down to try something new.
You're challenging me? You're not scared? Maybe you should be...
You wanna play with fire here? I hope you're expectin' to get burned....
Get ready to bow down to your queen! Especially you, "Player"~!
Bwahahaha! Come to reclaim your crown, princess?
(Shit, Peach is here. I wonder if she still remembers what I wrote in my diary... That was pretty embarrassing.)
Oh FUCK! I thought I could get away from the idiots from Smash Bros here... Oh wait. You're not the ink stain.
I've never trusted Italians. Not since that darn plumber kept getting in my way.
Who are you supposed to be, Mrs. Frilly Pants? You gonna tie me a balloon animal?
God.. damn.. What is wrong with that.. cat?
Oh wow! A hot spring! I haven't been to one in YEARS. Couldn't enjoy the last time either, thanks to a certain plumber and his fucking water gun.
A magic user? Say, ~magician~, would you like a job as my assistant? Kammy and Kamek didn't want to come for whatever reason.
Hello there... The princess I'm looking for is in another castle, but you'll do just fine.
Like I'm gonna pass up a chance to show off this killer new bod.
Um... do I seem mean? I'm trying my best to be evil.
A princess just got stolen from me. I'm pretty pissed, so if this goes badly, I will set this place ablaze.

Prepare to get demolished, by The Great Bowser!
(Or, Bowsette? I guess?)
It's everybody's favorite time, Bowser Time!
Koopa royalty doesn't go down easily you know. I hope you are ready for a challenge.
No backing out now! You've got to face the ferocious Princess Koopa!
Let's get this Mario Party started!
Prepare for a bitter defeat at the hands of Queen Bowsette!
Alright, where are the Uno cards?... Poker? Great! I suck at Uno anyway.
Pay your respects to me, Bowser, er... Bowsette! King... no, Queen of the Koopas! Anyone who doesn't will receive a kick to the face!
Time to show you punks why I'm the king...- I mean queen of the castle!
Blue shell, please.
Can I swap half an ace?
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
No I'm not changing my cards. Your eyes must play tricks on you.
Swap these.
Take these.
C'mon! C'mon! I don't want to masturbate in front of these losers!
How d'ya like these Koopa Shells? Do they... make your Goombas rise? Makes sense I breathe fire since I'm so hot! (...Okay, maybe I need to work on my pickup lines if I want to sell this schtick.)
You know girls, most ''strategists'' choose Tiki, Severa or Sumia….. or something.
Gaze upon your glorious ruler, my subjects.
Looks are deceiving when koopas are involved.
Yeah, come to Koopa!
Now you'll see why I modestly call myself a genius.
Now this is a hand fit for a king! Or a queen! Or whatever my title's supposed to be!
I need to set a good example for my son. Make sure he knows that he's always a winner so long as he works hard and cheats his ass off.
Even a Goomba could win with this hand.
I haven't done anything really rotten in a long time. Not since yesterday. This is a totally depraved, evil, insidious game. Perfectly fit for King Koopa.
Wanna beg for a touch?
Oh sure! I get good cards once I show off my tits! Screw you, dealer!
Hah! I'm hopin' you weren't lookin' forward to seeing these bad boys anytime soon...
You'd better hope you've got a BRIDGE and an AXE hidden in that hand. Bwa ha ha ha!
After I win this game, you should all come to my castle. I could always use more footstools!
Bwa ha ha! I thought you should know that my other losses don't count! The real game starts now!
Where I come from, star power makes you invincible!
Thanks, dealer! Maybe I won't eat you today after all.
Who wants to go karting after this? Should I wear the dress or go for a full bodysuit instead?
My castles have no running water. Plumbers are too much of a pain in the ass to work with.
The fuck do I do with these?
Meh. At least with Karting, I know whether I'm in the lead or not-- and adjust my cheating accordingly.
Why aren't we playing at my casino? I'd be getting better hands there!
Tech... bet ya scrubs all have worse cards than mine.
Should I announce my next victory as the Great Koopa King still? Or is it Queen? I'll just go with what feels right.
I think I'll send Mario through a poker themed world next time! Let's see him try and get through that one!
Average. Not planning on losing though.
This is the Luigi of hands.
This might be the end of my reign of terror... tch!
Since I've changed my name already, I think you should all start calling me The Bowsette! If you do, I might go easy on you after I win.
Is this deck rigged or something!? This is not fair!
Dealer. Need I remind you, I am a fire-breather. I could burn down this place if I desire, so help me god, give me some good fucking cards next time.
Do you want to feel the might of my Koopa Army, dealer!?
It's been one of those days...
These cards are flammable, right?
Do you think someone with my educational background is going to lose? How dare you?
You'd better hope these cards are flame retardant!
...Roasted dealer, coming right up!
Fuck. If I wanted to feel like a fool, I would have played checkers with that ape Donkey Kong. At least then I wouldn't have to stand around in next to nothing.
I just remembered I have a tail-styling appointment. No, that's not just an excuse: I really need to--- Okay, I‘ll stay just for you.
Y'know, Dealer, Mario isn't the only one who can give you a ground pound!
One bad hand won’t be enough for a game over.
Ha! I'd always win rounds against my underlings, even with hands this garbage!
... Grrr.
My clothes... gone. My cards... garbage. My huge cake... not even here.
I think the dealer slipped me a poison mushroom!
(What's the one thing most likely to rot my opponents' minds and reduce their brains to mashed potatoes?)
These cards are a lot of toadstool, dealer! Wanna have me jump on your head or somethin'?
I was hoping my new look would sway the dealer, but I guess I’ll have to come up with another plan.
Keep on giving me hands like these and I'll throw you in the fucking dungeon, dealer!
(I can't believe Peach would pick a fat Italian plumber who wears raccoon pajamas over me... Maybe she'd be willing to give this body a try instead...)
I met your Flame Princess, Marceline. She's hot.
There are some great go karting shortcuts on this beach. But I'm not telling you where they are! Bwahaha!
I've always had a passing interest in art. It is one of my son's favorite hobbies, after all.
Look at ~player~ getting lost in my cleavage. Obviously I'm not the only one with a lizard brain here.

You know, despite being able to breathe fire, I'm not actually fireproof. It's kind of ironic, really.
(Stupid fucking fire flowers...)
When I first put this crown on, I thought I'd suddenly become attracted to Italian men for some reason, but nope. I'm still really into blonde chicks.
If my rotten, insufferable Koopalings call, tell them I'm on a vacation at Seaside Kingdom.
Humans are so last century. Reptiles are where it's at.
Come to think of it, Bowser Jr. will finally get the mother he always wanted. But then he doesn't have a father anymore... Oh, what am I saying? I can do both! I'm no chump!
Ah, feel the freedom! There's nothing like being forced to appreciate why you're a nudist. I don't normally wear a dress, y'know.
You plum-dumbs got lucky, that's all.
Dammit. Look, it's not my fault I lost. Half the time I play cards with Mario they have stupid pictures of clouds and mushrooms and shit and no numbers. It's throwing off my game hard.
Without the crown, I usually walk around in nothing but the spiky armbands. Do you really think I'm going to complain about having to strip like these other morons?
I'll throw ya a bone. I let myself lose, after all.
You'll never beat me, faucet freaks!
Bwahaha, one minor setback won’t stop me from victory!
S-so... I guess I'll finally join you, losers. Well, at least I'm still in the lead...
Looks like I'm in the lead, as expected!
I guess I can give the rabble some small consolation...
Do these horns come off...? No...?
Are you that desperate to see my new body naked? Bwahahaha! Keep up the good plays then, but I won't hold back anymore!
Heh, really bringing your A-game, huh? You're gonna need to if 'ya plan to dethrone the Queen!
What?! I lost again?!
Pissed to hell that I'm losing. But, fuck it, it's still early on, right?
Dammit, I lost again?! Cheating's supposed to make you win!
You... you... AAAAAAAAAARGH!
Tch... Getting me this far? Either you're cheating or ya really like this body...
All of you are disinvited from my wedding.
After all of the dumb card games Mario and Luigi make me play, you'd think I'd be better at poker than this.
I may be losing, but it’s not game over yet.
Grrrr... Laugh, and I'll make sure that everybody's in the same spot as I am!
GAH! Come on, koopa, get in the game! Ugh, that's it---winning streak starts now!
You can't be serious...
Stop trying to win, you pinheads!
What? What are you looking at? I ain't stripping until one of these other losers strip.... (sigh) Fine, but it's the only time I'm stripping. Got it?
What is this load of Delfino Dookie? I'm Bowsette, I oughta be winnin' more!
What did I ever do to deserve this butt-whuppin'? Besides the kidnappings, thefts, and general mayhem.
...Is this how I get this thing off? Did I just tear it? How do dresses work?
This dress is so hard to move around in! Time to handle this problem the Bowser way.
I might have lost that round, but don't you dare think I'm a loser! Maybe you all need a good distraction...
Oh I'll give you a show alright! I bet the other princesses wouldn't dare do this!
Where did this dress even come from? I definitely weren't wearing one before I put on this crown... Don't you dare doubt me, ~player~!
You're probably expecting me to remove something boring, right? Well I'm not boring! I'm the friggin' Koopa Queen! Let me show you losers how a queen strips!
These were getting uncomfortable. Peach has terrible taste in shoes.
I usually go barefoot anyway. I don't need shoes to stomp those pesky Mario Brothers into pancakes. And I don't need shoes to stomp you into pancakes either.
You're really enjoying this aren't you? Go ahead and tell me, ~player~. I don't mind it at all~
Gwahaha. I know a few people who're into feet. You one of 'em?
My stockings it is. Aw, are you disappointed? Maybe you should try playing well.
Don't get cocky, as long as I get some good hands I can STILL crush you all beneath my heel.
I was against the idea of wearing these stupid things here, yet they feel so good against my skin that I had to keep them on!
Shut up about why I'm wearing these... Junior thought they looked good on me, and you try telling that kid no.
This crown's magic is impressive! Along with the clothes, it gave me these earrings too. I like 'em, so you better not lose 'em!
Ripped my fuckin' dress for this...
... Did I forget I had these..?!
Damn, this is really all I have left...
Yeah, once I get these off it'll be easier to kick your ass!
All this power, and good looks too! I know what you're thinking...
Go ahead, take a good look at what's gonna wear yer tongue out tonight!
How's this for a beach body?
The best part of being a firebreather is that I don't have to worry about the cold. I can waltz around in the snow buck naked without a care in the world. You humans and your dumb hypothermia.
Take a look at these honkers! Try not to blow your load too quickly now, will ya? GWAHAHAHA!
Curse this crown! Losing is one thing, but what I really regret is that I can't give you all a showin' of my Koopa Canon!
What's that? Take off something bigger? Sorry, I can't hear you over how much I don't care.
These assholes are heavy as hell. I guess it's for the feminine look, but fucking hell.
Be careful! When you pinch Bowser's titties, they pinch back.
Take a look at these Koopa Shells!
Aren't these melons totally fantastic? Certainly way better than any of those dumb princesses' racks.
... Honestly, I thought giant tits would work in my favor more, but by god if they don't get in the way sometimes. Not to mention the stares I get from goombas.
What'cha think? These Banzai Bills big enough for you? Don't answer. I couldn't give less of a fuck.
I don't mind showing off, but I hate to lose! Don't think you'll be getting the rest off this easily!
I swear these looked much cooler when they had spikes.
Well, enjoy the view, dearies. Nothing else is coming off...
It's either the shoes or the crown, and as fun as the later would be... I would have even less clothes afterwards. So count your blessings this time, worms!
Go ahead and get a good look! It's gonna make crushing you all the better!
So long! Straight Mario!
Let my guess... my thighs are "super thicc" and you want them to "sandwich" you... I know what you insufferable humans want.
These babies could crush a Koopa Shell! Not that I would crush one, but I'm just sayin'!
Enjoying yourself? Well, SAVOR IT, 'cause you won't be getting any more outta me! That's your QUEEN speaking!
No witty comments or I'll pulverize you! I bet ya I can crack your skull between my thighs! Wanna find out?
Admiring my legs? One of the great things about this form is that I could crack a nut with these thighs. Or maybe even someone's skull!
There. Don't stare at my perfect long legs too much.
Fine, whatever! They were itchy anyway!

*rrrrrip*
Won't be needing this! Fancy dress balls are no match for undressed balls anyway.
That’s better. Never really understood the appeal of dresses or skirts like the princesses do.
I never saw the appeal of these stupid things anyway. Give me a shell over these any day of the week.
Sexy lingerie? I wasn't wearing these when I first put on this crown to turn into a female koopa... No, I definitely weren't wearing these when I was still a male koopa... I-I s-swear..!
BAH! Who needs this thing! Here, let a koopa show you pathetic rubes how stripping is REALLY DONE!
Take a picture -- it'll last longer!
Tell me... how do you feel about kneeling before your queen?
If you think I'm embarrassed, then think again! I always walk around naked anyway.
What were you expecting, some kind of turtle dick?
Most of the time, these spiky armbands are all that I need to wear.
Shavin'? I'm a lizard, what do I have to shave?
SHOWTIME! How d'ya like that?
I'm the biggest, baddest bitch around, and don't you forget it.
This one looks tasty...
Gwahahaha! Even when I'm down, you're still gonna lose!
BAHAHA! The new look this crown gave me may be great, but I'm still me, which means I will still WIN!
Wah, Hah, HAH!
Come on, give me a good show and maybe I won't throw you into the nearest firepit.
BAHAHA! Don't lose your nerve now, pipsqueak. Its more fun to crush my enemies when they put up a fight.

state.text: [Bowsette's AI Opponent Must Strip (Male) dialogue is incomplete.] Contribute here: https://tinyurl.com/y2on2gzf

case.state: Mwa ha! Did you think I was just going to give the win to ya? You've got to earn it first! Or cheat better than me!
Hey there, "Pop Star." Haven't seen you since that Ramen Chick stole your Smash invite. Sucks to be you... or should I say, sucks to be a Mii.
Oh great, another Princess Boosette impersonator. Like the last one wasn't enough.
"Marth?" Yeah right. Nice try, Princess, but you're not fooling anyone but yourself. Next time, try a Super Crown like the rest of us.
Huh. Never thought I'd meet another talking toy that was packing heat.
I thought ghosts couldn't hold weapons! All this time the boos have been avoiding training, those lazy balls of ectogunk!
Gwa-ha-ha! Like I tell my son, anythin's possible if ya cheat enough!
Ha! Nice...
Oh, you lost. Boohoo. Just hurry up and strip, slut. I'm getting cold.
Hah! Looks like yer down one life!
What a joke of a hand! Next time, put some actual thought into it!
Come on, honey. Take off something nice for me...
Oh, don't you complain...! You could be me...!
Better get used to this feeling, babe. You'll be feeling it a lot today with me here! BAHAHA!
Don't get cocky just because I've lost a few hands, pipsqueak!
Woah, I forgot you were in this game for a second, ~name~. Ya kinda don't rate compared to me.
Well, ya lose often enough. How about it, wanna become one of my minions?

Don't forget who's the queen around here, and who ain't!
It's me, I'm the queen.
We're waiting, girly!

state.text: [Bowsette's AI Opponent Must Strip (Female) dialogue is incomplete.] Contribute here: https://tinyurl.com/y2on2gzf

case.state: Nobody asked you, Sega Genesis.
A tie?! So no one has to strip? What a waste of a hand!
What a waste of time.
What the hell! I didn't even know that was possible!
Oh. Shit.
That was a waste of goddamned time!
What? We have a tie for last place? What a waste of time...
What a waste of time! Let's move on already.
Wait, is that a tie?!
I didn't realize that could happen!
So nobody has to strip? What a wasted round!
Oh wow how INCREDIBLE oh the INTRIGUE oh the - HOW IS THIS MUCH GOING ON WHEN I'M ALREADY DONE??
Keep this up and maybe I will take off the crown.
Just once I'd like ta have a minion that couldn't be defeated by some Italian jumpin' on top of 'em three times.
You're such a tease, ~name~...
This is how it starts. Big losing streak for you COMING UP, I'm calling it right now! Ya ready, pipsqueak?
Ridiculous! I watch Mario lose his hat every other day! You waste my time!
This little..? Are ya taunting me, you clown?!
Are you strong enough to rid me of a couple of troublesome fools, ~name~? Nothing I've tried has worked.
Seriously, ~name~? Is that all you can strip?

state.text: [Bowsette's Male Removing Accessory dialogue is incomplete.] Contribute here: https://tinyurl.com/y2on2gzf

case.state: Bah! You should've taken that off ages ago!
Mmmh... was Monday for kidnapping Peach again, or was that the day me n' Mario go karting and party?
Oh I get it. Just because you can see my tits, that means you can take off whatever the hell you want. Well, tell you what. Do that again and I'll show you the wrath of the Queen of the Koopas!
Do you know why they call me the Queen of Horny? It's because I got these giant horns, which I'm gonna use to spear you if that's all yer takin' off!
Take off something better next time, you parmesan-devouring pest!
Speedrunners...
I can't say I'm happy with you removing your ~clothing~, but since I still have my bands on... I guess I'll hold my tongue. But only this time!
Boy, don't MAKE me come over there and take something off for you!
At this rate, I'm going to have to strip you myself!
Hmph... Junior better behave himself while I'm gone. Hard keeping that kid busy when he'd rather play with his little bombs.
Wow. We have matching bands. Is this what they call bonding? I kinda... hate it.
Go ahead, take off the crown! Then I'll be the only hot woman here!
Are you kidding me...? I may be a princess now, but I don't cover myself with shitty trinkets!
I think I'll make koopa soup for dinner tonight.
Come on, girl! Not even I take that much time stripping, and I have to account for a spiked shell!
Yes! Yeeeeesss! Soon, the winning will begin!
Whenever someone strips it's all "Me! Me! Me!", when there's obviously more important things to talk about... like me.
Oh that's great... You really pulled out all the stops on that one.
Mph... You're slower than... err... Junior usually helps me come up with my insults...
C'mon, get it over with!

state.text: [Bowsette's Female Removing Accessory dialogue is incomplete.] Contribute here: https://tinyurl.com/y2on2gzf

case.state: Whoa! Cat ears. Are those real or did you sneak a Super Bell in without us noticing?
How dare you trick us with removing that accessory, Twilight Sparkle!
I'm too horny for this shit! Take off something real before I take it off fer ya!
Damn, I must look like a fool right now. If Mario were here, I'd crush him with a Thwomp.
Don't be shy, ~name~. I know what'cha heard of me, but I don't bite.
If you want help with being bolder, I could always set your clothing ablaze. Your ~clothing~ wouldn't help you at all at that point.
Done like a true amateur.
If I have to burn something off of you, I will.
I am the ki... I mean QUEEN of cards!
Quit stalling! You're only delaying your own defeat, you know?
I would clap sarcastically, but I do that enough in Smash Brothers. And my hands are full of cards. Whatever. NEXT.
Don't be afraid to lose this next round too! Not that you'll have much of a choice playing against me.
Bwahaha! It ain't much, but you're getting your game over eventually, lady!
You'll wanna know what I don't have all of? It's day! Hurry up, ~name~!
Why is it that so many of my bosses have giant, glowy eyes on their weak spots?
I tried playin' this game with some Koopa Troopas as practice 'fore comin' here, right? 'Cept Koopas got nothin' to lose but their shells, so I won every game.
(Don't get mad. Don't Get Mad. DON'T GET MAD! I'M GETTING MAD!)
Ugh. To have to watch you only take off THAT, after I've already lost like this... What a sad day for the Koopa Troop.

Ugh, seriously!? You're just as big of a coward as that scrawny little beanpole always cowering behind Mario.
...What was his name again? Luigi?
(How do these floozies come up with better pick-up lines than I do? Ugh, I need to up my game. I'll show them!)
Come on, you fucker! Live a little! Take off something fun!
One step closer. I can always burn the rest away if you want me to end it right now. Bwahahaha!
If you keep this up, I swear, I'm taking off my crown until things get more interesting. Pay up, or it's Bowser Time!
That's a bit unfair...
Oh, go on, Mr. Comedian! I'm just dying to see the rest of your hilarious comedy routine, with you barely stripping while I'm like this!
Bwah! If you were just going to take off that, you could have at least put on a show.
W-wait, what's goin' on? Yer not Princess Boosette!
Princess Boosette? That you? Ya look a little different....
This is bullturds... This game's rigged!
You could... Ngh... Afford to loosen up a bit! Considering that I'm already like t-this... Grrh...
This is - nghf - humiliating. I lost by so much. I must get Kamek to do something - hahh - to make sure this doesn't happen again...
Glad you did that now. That woulda made my cunt drier than a desert when jerking off. That's how much of a turn off it is.
Argh... What do women want to hear when they strip? ...Wait. What would I want to hear?
Aw, crap... I only now realized I never got my deposit back from the moon chapel.

Rampaging reptiles!
You're a zombie?!
Damn, I suck at this game. I should just go back to kidnapping princesses
How did I get so far behind?
Not getting played for a fool this time! That's your job!

state.text: [Bowsette's Female Removed Minor Item dialogue is incomplete.] Contribute here: https://tinyurl.com/y2on2gzf

case.state: Ooooh yeah, come to daddy~ Or, mommy. Or, you know what, never rmind.
Hah, that's nothing! I see that every time a koopa pops out of its shell! When are ya showing me the real goods, huh?
Normally, I take stars or coins from losers who cross my path, but this will do as a substitute.
It's times like these that make me happy to be a king, er... queen.
Yes, show me more, weakling! Remove it all for me.
Oh~? Is that present all wrapped up for me~?

state.text: [Bowsette's Male Removed Major Item dialogue is incomplete.] Contribute here: https://tinyurl.com/y2on2gzf

case.state: Just tear it off! Don't be a coward.
Pah! Amateurs! None of you will ever see what lies beneath my layers!
I like winning, sure, but usually that's when all my plans come crashing down, so ya can't blame this Koopa for being uneasy right now.
Nghf - yes, show me more - ungh - show your Queen more. I - ahh! I demand it!
Even though I'm finished, this sight makes me wanna start over.
Hey, babe. Spread your legs a bit, it looks to be a li'l see-through where your cunt is.
Gwahaha! If you're gonna come to Strip Poker Night, at least wear some sexier panties!
This is much better than those games I don't let Junior play.
How does it feel to know a magical crown has better fashion sense than you?
How's that saying go? "Nudity loves company"? No, that's not right. But your Queen is looking forward to what comes next, regardless.
Saaaay, ~name~... you into being kidnapped? Bein' tied up, all tight?
... (This is good material.)
Very nice! Very nice! Your powerful frame will serve my army well!
Damn! That's pretty good, hot stuff!
Feh, ya look like a real beanpole. Nobody notices the guys that're all skin and bones-- someone oughta fatten you up!
Whats'a matter, fatso, you eat too much pasta? Well lucky for you I don't mind that body type, but I'll be sure you get a real workout soon!
Niiiice chest, ~name~. Maybe after the game we can get together and compare our pecs.
Now we're even.
I think I can speak for everyone here when I say "Nice." What else do have for your queen?
You're only showing me that NOW? You humiliate me, THEN taunt me like this? Why I oughta...
Yesss....show me more. Show your Queen some more! I demand it! Gya ha ha ha!
Seeing that chest of yours just made me feel even hornier, baby!
(W-why I am getting turned on by a man's chest!? This crown must be affecting my brain or something...)
Now, show us your super-shroom! Hope it's as big as the ones in my kingdom...
You didn't need to play poker if you just wanted to strip for me.
Is that a Bullet Bill in your pants? Well we're about to find out.
What's taking you so long? Take that off or I'll bite it off myself!
Have you got a surprise for us, ~target~? I sure hope it's a big one, I'm a bit hungry...
You think you have something down there that will impress me? Well, flop it out and let's see it.
Time for ~name~ to show us his mushroom. This should be entertaining.
I hope it's good enough for royalty. You don't want to know what I do to my servants that disappoint me...
What is that thing? I was expecting a giant Wiggler, not a tiny Biddybud. Why would you even start playing if you knew you were going to disappoint everyone?
That‘s so pathetic...
You made me wait for that? Please. I've seen bigger on a Toad. What am I supposed to do with something so pathetic?
Huge tits, small cock.
O-oh... uhhmm... That's surprisingly adorable...
Another small mushroom. I could've stayed in my kingdom for that.
Ha! Looks like ~name~ is packing a mini mushroom. Tell me, if you get a blowjob, does your partner shrink to half their size?
BWA-HA-HA! Pathetic, just like the rest of you! You're not pleasing anyone with that, buster!
I hear Mario's is pretty small too. Might explain his hero complex.
If only the wait was as short...
Can't relate.
You call that tiny thing a dick? Mine was ten times the size of that fucking peashooter!
You're hiding a mushroom in your pants and you didn't even tell any of us!? Whaddaya mean I can't eat it, that's what Mario always does?
Well... that's disappointing ya limp-dicked wimp.
Too late to pleasure me, y'know... Not like you would've - I've seen goombas bigger than you!

This is a PISS POOR tribute. I'd ask what you are going to do to make it up to me, but I don't see what you POSSIBLY could have to offer. At least I am still CRUSHING you - so get ready for more of that, pipsqueak!
Y'ever heard the saying: "It's not the size that matters; it's the way you use it"?
At last, we get to see what you were hiding down there. Now, let's see if we can make you use it.
It's not as small as I thought it would be, but hardly impressive. Maybe you should try eating a mega mushroom if you want to impress me.
Whoa! And I thought I had a monster cock in my original form!
That's bigger than mine normally is.
